title: My Personal Webpage
text:
Welcome to my personal page! I thrive on solving complex problems and love turning innovative ideas into reality. Whether I‚Äôm coding, designing, or exploring new fields, I bring dedication and curiosity to everything I do. Outside of work, I enjoy hiking, reading science fiction, and experimenting with new recipes. Here, you‚Äôll find insights into my projects, interests, and the journey I‚Äôm on to make a positive impact in the world. Thank you for visiting, and I hope you find something that inspires you!
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: A sample work
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure¬†1.


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()








Figure¬†1: A line plot on a polar axis

title: About
text: Hello! I‚Äôm Rohith M B, currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science Engineering with a minor in Computational Mathematics. My academic journey blends a deep passion for technology with a strong focus on mathematical principles. I‚Äôm proficient in programming languages such as Python and C, and have experience working with databases like MongoDB. This combination of skills allows me to approach complex problems with both a software and mathematical perspective. I‚Äôm excited to leverage my expertise in innovative projects and contribute to advancements in the tech industry.
